glossdef.p: These words may usually be omitted with advantage.

row.entry: Works of fiction are listed under the names of their respective authors.
Works of fiction are listed under the names of their authors.
The one mile and two mile runs were won by Jones and Cummings respectively.
The one mile and two mile runs were won by Jones and by Cummings.

glossdef.p: In some kinds of formal writing, as geometrical proofs, it may be necessary to use respectively, but it should not appear in writing on ordinary subjects.
